vendor_name: The Ungasan Cliff Top Resort, Bali
title: Clifftop Pool Villa Escape with Private Butler and VIP Beach Club Access
description: Experience Balinese luxury at its finest with a stay at the breathtaking Ungasan Clifftop Resort, Uluwatu. Stay in an elegant villa overlooking the ocean complete with a private plunge pool and butler service at your fingertips. Enjoy sumptuous daily breakfast, one two-course lunch for two, one three-course dinner for two, a 75-minute couples' spa treatment, return airport transfers, and daily VIP access to the spectacular Sundays Beach Club with a daily cocktail each.
offer_address: Jl Pantai Selatan Gau | Banjar Wijaya Kusuma, Ungasan 80362, Indonesia

title: Uluwatu Private Pool Villa Seclusion with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner, Cocktails & Roundtrip Transfers
description:
Endless Indian Ocean vistas and quintessential Balinese hospitality await at the blissful Hideaway Villas. Set on a hillside overlooking the ocean in the distance, and enveloped by the tropical Uluwatu jungle, this serene retreat offers a collection of beautifully designed pool villas, just a stone’s throw from some of Bali’s best surfing beaches and hottest beach clubs - truly your slice of Bali paradise. Perfect for romantic honeymoons or adventurous family escapes alike, indulge your senses at the restorative Bamboo Spa and savour exquisite local flavours at Basé Restaurant where each dish is made to order.

Positioned in charming Uluwatu, famed for its quirky cafes, artisan flair and laidback surfer vibe, this peaceful villa complex is within easy reach of the area’s restaurants, markets and independent boutiques. When you are ready to explore, head to the nearby Uluwatu Temple, an ancient sea temple dating back to the 11th century, boasting a dramatic clifftop position overlooking the crashing waves of the Indian Ocean. Soak up the views and meet the resident monkeys that roam the grounds, before retreating to your idyllic private paradise.
offer_address: Jl. Bangbang Bendot, Gang Hideaway, Uluwatu, Bali, Indonesia

title: Five-Star Uluwatu Cliffside Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Two-Hour Free-Flow Cocktails & Massages
description:
Embrace blissful seclusion perched on a clifftop overlooking the magnificent Indian Ocean with a stay at this ultra-stylish, palm-dotted resort, perfectly positioned in Bali’s happening southernmost tip: Uluwatu. Located just moments from plunging cliff faces, spellbinding coastline and spectacular sunsets, and boasting privileged views over the shimmering Bingin and Padang Padang beaches - it’s truly a surfer’s paradise.

Traditional Balinese design is at the forefront of Radisson Blu Resort, Bali Uluwatu, beckoning you with its tranquillity, spacious accommodation and world-class amenities.

Spend your days here discovering the island's exquisite coral reefs, golden beaches and volcanic mountains, before returning to this five-star oasis. Perfect for honeymooners and couples, this resort offers the best of relaxed island luxury. It's here that you can relax by the spectacular pool, indulge in traditional Indonesian and international delights at Artichoke or slick Western fare at the semi-alfresco Choka pool bar, or take a breather and unwind with massages at the Spa ESC.
offer_address: Jalan Pemutih, Jalan Labuansait, Pecatu, Kuta Selatan, Badung 80364, Bali

title: Ultra Lux Uluwatu Clifftop Pool Suites & Villas with Daily Breakfast, Dinner & Free-Flow Cocktail Hour
description:
Escape to the pinnacle of secluded coastal luxury perched atop the famous limestone cliffs of Bali’s southernmost peninsula. Immerse yourself in sweeping 180-degree views of the glittering Indian Ocean from your spacious suite or villa, and watch as the sun dips below the horizon from the spectacular resort pool that clings to the cliff's edge over three terraced levels.

As evening arrives, relax against the backdrop of the darkening sky with an expertly crafted cocktail served at their signature Cliff Bar, or unwind beneath the stars with an open-air cinema screening for a truly magical experience. This five-star eco-sanctuary combines its signature zero-waste concept with carefully curated and sophisticated contemporary touches, creating effortlessly elegant spaces you’ll never want to leave.

Rejuvenate your body and soul with daily yoga and meditation, surrender to pure bliss at the wellness spa and indulge in gourmet farm-to-table sustainable dining at the resort’s two restaurants, including Japanese and Peruvian fusion at Watu Steakhouse. This is the ultimate paradise, where luxury meets true tranquillity.
offer_address: Jalan Goa Lempeh, Uluwatu 80361, Bali, Indonesia

title: Cliffside Six Senses Luxury with Daily Free-Flow Cocktails
description:
Venture to the edge of the world, where every view is of the ocean and secluded luxury is a given: welcome to Six Senses Uluwatu. Dive into this eco-sanctuary, Bali’s only World Green Council-certified resort, with luxury inclusions befitting Travel + Leisure Magazine’s #1 hotel brand. 

Your escape includes daily buffet breakfast with à la carte options, two three-course set menu dinners for two, daily free-flow cocktails (5pm to 6pm) overlooking the ocean, a ‘Cinema Under the Stars’ experience with popcorn, daily unlimited homemade ice cream, your choice of transfer to or from Denpasar Airport, welcome seasonal fruits on arrival, six pieces of laundry per room, per day, and a guaranteed 6pm late checkout.

Travel freely with no surcharges.

⏱**Buy now, book later**: Secure this deal now and choose your travel dates when you're ready (see Fine Print for details)
offer_address: Jalan Goa Lempeh, Uluwatu 80361, Bali, Indonesia

title: Grand Opening: Uluwatu Boutique Suites & Villas with Daily Breakfast, Dinner & Free-Flow Cocktail Hour
description:
Discover your slice of paradise at this seaside sanctuary in Uluwatu, where boutique suites and villas sit peacefully on the Island of the Gods. Raw timber, concrete and stone finishes create a cocoon of calm, carried by the ocean breeze and elevated by stylish facilities - including a cliffside spa, refined restaurant and shimmering infinity pool.

Savour precision-crafted Japanese cuisine at Tsune Uluwatu, where every dish is a minimalist masterpiece served against a scenic ocean backdrop. At Svaha Spa Bingin, tension dissolves with every tailored treatment as you soak up the rhythm of the sea from a distance.

Perfect for couples, this new Balinese jewel provides the perfect launching pad for exploring secret coves by day and glowing skies by dusk, before retreating to a private haven where thoughtful design and quiet indulgence come standard. Unveiled in 2025, this clifftop stay is Uluwatu's newest scene-stealer - and you can be among the first to experience it.
offer_address: Seascape Uluwatu Complex, Jl. Labuansait, Pecatu, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Uluwatu Ultimate Cliffside Pool Villas with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinner & Free-Flow Drinks Hour

As evening arrives, relax against the backdrop of the darkening sky with a delicious cocktail served at their signature Cliff Bar, or watch a movie under the twinkling stars before venturing to one of Bali's many famed beach clubs. This five-star eco-sanctuary combines its signature zero-waste concept with carefully curated contemporary touches, creating effortlessly elegant spaces you’ll never want to leave.

Rejuvenate your body and soul with daily yoga and meditation, relax at the blissful wellness spa and indulge in gourmet farm-to-table sustainable dining at the resort’s two restaurants, including Japanese at Watu Steakhouse. This is the ultimate paradise, where luxury meets true tranquillity.
offer_address: Jalan Goa Lempeh, Uluwatu 80361, Bali, Indonesia

description: Fall in love with the super stylish and ultra-chic Radisson Blu Uluwatu with its secluded, waterfront location, palm tree-dotted property, ultra-spacious rooms and five-star service. Experience a five or seven-night getaway in an Ocean View Room and indulge in a daily buffet ‘Super Breakfast’, three two-course lunches or dinners at your choice of any of the onsite restaurants, daily sunset cocktail for two, four 45-minute signature massages to share and a private airport pick-up or drop off from Ngurah Rai International Airport.
offer_address: JI Pemutih, Pecatu, Kuta Sel., Pecatu, Bali 80364, Indonesia

title: Five-Star Uluwatu Cliffside Luxury with Daily Dining & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Secluded luxury and endless ocean views await at the five-star Anantara Uluwatu Bali Resort, an award-winning sanctuary of serenity ranked #6 among the Top 10 Resorts in Indonesia in Condé Nast Traveler Readers' Choice Awards 2021. Perfectly poised on a clifftop on Bali's south coast, overlooking the Indian Ocean, this luxury hotel is surrounded by dramatic coastal landscape, native jungle and lush rice paddies, but is just 15 minutes from the centre of bustling Uluwatu.

Intimate and stylish, Anantara Uluwatu Bali Resort will exceed your expectation of paradise with its myriad luxe facilities. Tantalise your tastebuds with fusion delights at a host of bars and restaurants, relish lazy days at the Insta-worthy infinity pool, discover true tranquillity at Anantara Spa, slice through the cliffside with private beach elevator access to the sands below and soak up the chilled-out vibes of Uluwatu with complimentary beach shuttles. All suites feature a private jacuzzi, luxurious amenities, plush bedding and bespoke touches, offering guests a spacious sanctuary away from it all.
offer_address: Jl. Pemutih - Labuan Sait, Uluwatu, Pecatu, Kuta Selatan, Pecatu, Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80364, Indonesia

title: Clifftop Uluwatu Six Senses Paradise with Daily Breakfast, Two-Course Lunch or Dinner & Daily Two Hours Free Flow Drinks
description:

Immerse yourself in sweeping views of the glittering Indian Ocean and watch as the sun dips below the horizon from the spectacular resort pool that clings to the cliff's edge over three terraced levels. As evening arrives, relax against the backdrop of the darkening sky with a delicious cocktail served at Cliff Bar.

This opulent eco-sanctuary - the island's only World Green Council-certified resort - combines its signature zero-waste concept with carefully curated contemporary touches, creating effortlessly elegant spaces you’ll never want to leave. Rejuvenate your body and soul with daily yoga and meditation, relax at the blissful wellness spa and indulge in gourmet farm-to-table sustainable dining at the resort’s two restaurants, including Japense fusion at the recently opened Watu Steakhouse. This is where luxury meets true tranquillity.

title: Bali Ultimate Luxury: Clifftop Pool Villas with Daily Breakfast, Nightly 3-Course Dinner & Nightly Cocktails
description:
A seamless fusion of Italian elegance and Balinese charm, this resplendent resort is an opulent sanctuary perched atop a breathtaking 160-metre cliff along the island’s southern coast. This exclusive retreat, crafted by the renowned luxury house Bvlgari, offers an unrivaled escape with sweeping views of the Indian Ocean and access to a secluded, pristine beach.

Designed for the most discerning travelers, Bvlgari Resort Bali redefines indulgence with bespoke butler service, lavishly appointed villas and exquisite interiors adorned with handcrafted Indonesian antiques. Each villa boasts a private infinity pool, seamlessly blending sophisticated design with nature’s raw beauty.

Beyond your private haven, embark on a culinary journey at Sangkar, savour authentic Italian flavours with a Balinese touch at Il Ristorante - Luca Fantin or sip sunset cocktails at the iconic Bvlgari Bar. Unwind with holistic treatments at the world-class Bvlgari Spa, while kids revel in tailored activities at the Little Gems Club. For those eager to explore, the cultural wonders of Uluwatu and beyond await.
offer_address: Jalan Goa Lempeh, Banjar Dinas Kangin, Uluwatu, Badung, Bali 80364, Indonesia

title: Clifftop Pool Villa Indulgence in Uluwatu
description: Experience five-star Balinese luxury at its finest with an Uluwatu clifftop getaway at Banyan Tree Ungasan. Perfect for couples and honeymooners, you will stay in your own spacious private pool villa, with the option to upgrade to stunning ocean views. Named one of the Most Luxurious Hotels in the World by Forbes Travel Guide, a stay at Banyan Tree Ungasan is sure to be an unforgettable experience. Includes three two-course dining experiences, one luxurious massage with your choice of reflexology or head and shoulder massage, a cocktail at the amazing Ju-Ma-Na bar, a one-way private airport transfer and daily breakfast.
offer_address: Banjar Kelod, Jl. Melasti, Ungasan, Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80364, Indonesia

title: Private Pool Villa Escape with Gourmet Dining & Massages

Experience unparalleled privacy and indulge in daily breakfast - including one floating breakfast served in your private swimming pool - plus three delicious four-course dinners, a two-course set menu lunch, four 60-minute massages per room, a private one-way transfer from Denpasar Airport and more.
offer_address: 1 Jalan Harjani, Ungasan, South Kuta, Badung Regency, Bali 80361, Indonesia

description: Experience the tranquillity of Bali's Uluwatu region at the secluded Hideaway Residence Bali, where private pools and a la carte breakfasts are part of the everyday. Just minutes from the famous Ungasan Badung Regency statue and fantastic beach clubs, this retreat is the ultimate escape for those seeking a balance of fun in the sun and cultural wonders. Enjoy authentic Indonesian cuisine at local eateries and immerse yourself in the spiritual serenity of Uluwatu Temple. Each villa boasts modern amenities, along with a private pool and a sun-kissed deck with sunloungers, providing an idyllic setting for your Bali escape.

title: Cliffside Uluwatu Private Pool Villa Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Embrace blissful seclusion with a luxury private pool villa stay at the newly renovated Prasana by Arjani Resorts, perfectly positioned in Uluwatu, Bali’s happening southernmost tip. Located just moments from plunging cliff faces, spellbinding coastline and spectacular sunsets, and boasting privileged views over the shimmering Indian Ocean, there’s no better place to soak up the island’s inimitable soul. Enjoy a sunrise walk to the golden sands of Melasti Beach and return to Menaka Spa for a wellness treatment drawing on ancient healing techniques. After an indulgent spa session, visit Whim for sumptuous plates and innovative cocktails showcasing Bali’s culinary brilliance. Finish with a decadent dark chocolate dessert or house-made gelato at Petit Garcon.

If you’re looking to explore the stunning region, there’s no better place to soak up Bali’s unique ambience. Take advantage of the resort's complimentary shuttle and enjoy local attractions like fire dancing at Uluwatu Temple, surfing at Padang-Padang Beach and the region's top beach clubs. Spend your evenings savouring Uluwatu's electrifying clifftop nightlife beneath the stars and return to your newly reimagined villa, elevated with countless luxury touches.
offer_address: 1 Jalan Harjani, Ungasan, South Kuta, Badung Regency, Bali 80361, Indonesia

description:
Endless Indian Ocean views and quintessential Balinese hospitality await at the blissful Hideaway Villas. Set on a hillside overlooking the ocean and enveloped by tropical Uluwatu jungle, this serene retreat offers a collection of beautifully designed pool villas, just a stone’s throw from some of Bali’s best surfing beaches and hottest beach clubs.

title: Bali: 7-Day Group Fitness Festival Retreat with All-Inclusive Chef-Prepared Meals, Daily Activities & Roundtrip Transfers
description:
Step up into six nights of fitness and fun on Uluwatu’s glorious golden sands and celebrate the 10-year anniversary of Active Escapes with this one-of-a-kind festival extravaganza. There's no better place to focus on your health and wellness as you savour each unforgettable sunset from the balcony of your spacious private room at the cliffside Radisson Blu Resort Bali Uluwatu, just a short jog from the world-class surf of Padang Padang beach and Uluwatu’s town centre. Plus, the entire resort will be exclusively reserved by Active Escapes, ensuring that you’ll be surrounded by like-minded fitness and wellness enthusiasts.

Be fuelled with locally sourced, chef-prepared meals (breakfast, lunch and dinner) throughout your stay, and enjoy action-packed fun and adventure, including daily fitness sessions, non-motorised water sports, yoga, and more. Before you head home filled with amazing memories and lifelong friendships, your stay ends with a one-of-a-kind party to celebrate a decade of fitness and fun, with live music and guest DJs.
offer_address: Bali Uluwatu, Jl. Pemutih, Pecatu, Kec. Kuta Sel., Bali, 80364, Indonesia

title: Five-Star Bali Uluwatu Private Pool Villas on Billionaire’s Row with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Welcome to Karma Kandara, your own secluded slice of paradise discreetly tucked away in Bali’s Bukit Peninsula, known globally as ‘Billionaire’s Row’. Ideally positioned clifftop in the charming village of Ungasan, this exclusive villa complex is home to a collection of expansive one, two and three-bedroom pool villas, and is within easy reach of some of the island's must-see sights. Discover tranquillity at the resort's ocean-facing infinity pool, sample flavour-packed, Mediterranean-inspired bites at di Mare restaurant or for something more relaxing, try lighter snacks at Karma Beach or cocktails at Temple Lounge.

For those looking to get out and about, strike the perfect balance between relaxation and nightlife with an abundance of mouthwatering restaurants, seaside cafés and local flea markets just a short walk away. What's more, thriving beach clubs such as Sundays Beach Club, Mïnoo Beach Club, Savaya Bali, Roosterfish and Oneeighty Dayclub are all within a 15-minute drive.
offer_address: Banjar Wijaya Kusuma, Ungasan, Kuta Selatan, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Uluwatu Tranquil Five-Star Luxury with Gourmet Dining, Nightly Cocktails & One-Way Private Airport Transfer
description:
Experience the pinnacle of secluded romance at Renaissance Bali Uluwatu Resort & Spa, a five-star sanctuary bound to offer an unexpected and local lens to Bali’s Bukit peninsula. Nestled amid dramatic cliffs, this luxury hotel - part of Marriott’s premium Renaissance Hotels brand - is surrounded by rich Balinese jungle but just 20 minutes from the waves of Uluwatu’s famed Padang Padang Beach and the cool, calm waters of Dreamland Beach.

Make the most of the resort’s luxurious amenities, which include three pools, a state-of-the-art fitness centre, a full-service spa, and a kids' club. The jewel in the resort’s crown? Its ultra-stylish beach club, Roosterfish, a chilled venue on the shores of Pandawa Beach - just a short, complimentary shuttle bus away. Enjoy an all-day culinary experience at Clay Craft restaurant, learn the techniques and secrets of Indonesian cookery at the Cooking Studio, or swim up and enjoy quality snacks and drinks at the Pool Bar. In the evening, sample creative cocktails overlooking a splendid coastal setting at the unbeatable R Bar.
offer_address: Jl. Pantai Balangan I No.1, Ungasan, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia•+62 361 2003588

title: Clifftop Luxury at Bali's Most Instagrammable Resort
description: Endless Indian Ocean views and a jaw-dropping, glass-bottom sky pool extending over the cliff edge towards the most breathtaking 180° panorama: welcome to The Edge in Uluwatu, Bali. Stay in an enormous one-bedroom private pool villa with dedicated 24-hour butler service, daily a la carte breakfast served in the comfort of your villa, nightly dinner, one daily cocktail each, one signature 60-minute massage per person and private VIP return airport transfers.

title: Cliffside Uluwatu Private Pool Villa Retreat with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch or Dinner & Nightly Cocktails
description:

Located just moments from plunging cliff faces, spellbinding coastline and spectacular sunsets, and boasting privileged views over the shimmering Indian Ocean, there’s no better place to soak up the island’s inimitable soul.

Enjoy a sunrise walk to the golden sands of Melasti Beach and return to Menaka Spa for a wellness treatment drawing on ancient healing techniques. After an indulgent spa session, visit Whim for sumptuous plates and innovative cocktails showcasing Bali’s culinary brilliance. Finish with a decadent dark chocolate dessert or house-made gelato at Petit Garçon.

If you’re looking to explore the stunning region, there’s no better place to soak up Bali’s unique ambience. Take advantage of the resort's complimentary shuttle and enjoy local attractions like fire dancing at Uluwatu Temple, surfing at Padang-Padang Beach and the region's top beach clubs.
offer_address: 1 Jalan Harjani, Ungasan, South Kuta, Badung Regency, Bali 80361, Indonesia

vendor_name: The Ungasan Cliff Top Resort, Bali
title: Clifftop Uluwatu One-Bedroom Private Pool Suites with Gourmet Dining, VIP Beach Club Access & Roundtrip Transfers
description:
Discover a new definition for Balinese indulgence by escaping to The Ungasan Clifftop Resort, staying in an extraordinary One-Bedroom Plunge Pool Suite, perched on the cliffs of the Bukit Peninsula. Sitting above Uluwatu’s famous Sundays Beach Club, this luxury resort, ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor, redefines what it is to be truly relaxed, with a soundtrack of crashing waves and panoramic ocean views as far as the eye can see.

Celebrate opulence from the luxury of your exclusive suite, where traditional architectural styles are combined with modern amenities to offer oceanside living at its best. Spend your days lazing by the infinity pool, snacking on local and international delicacies at the Pool Lounge, or head to Sundays Beach Club, where free watersports hire and a VIP seating area await. Enjoy a beachside massage at the Club’s Spa Bale, or venture to indoor Vela Spa, where signature treatments include body scrubs, massages, facials and reflexology. Align your chakras with a private yoga session, or practise your swing on the tennis court or putting green. Villa guests need not leave their plush surroundings - private pools, yoga sessions and in-villa dining come as standard, with floating breakfasts and show-stopping BBQs on offer.
offer_address: Jl Pantai Selatan Gau | Banjar Wijaya Kusuma, Ungasan 80362, Indonesia

title: Bali Villa Luxury with Glass-Bottom Cliffside Pool, Daily Dining & Cocktails
description: Endless Indian Ocean views and a jaw-dropping, glass-bottom sky pool extending over the cliff edge towards the most breathtaking 180° panorama: welcome to The Edge in Uluwatu, Bali. Stay in an enormous one-bedroom private pool villa with dedicated 24-hour butler service, daily à la carte breakfast served in the comfort of your villa, nightly two-course à la carte dinner, one post-dinner cocktail each, a signature 60-minute ‘The Edge’ massage per person and private VIP return airport transfers.
offer_address: Jalan Pura Goa Lempeh Banjar Dinas Kangin Pecatu, Uluwatu, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

vendor_name: The Ungasan Cliff Top Resort, Bali
title: A-List Escape: Clifftop Pool Villa with Private Butler and VIP Access to Exclusive Beach Club
description: Experience endless Indian Ocean views and Balinese luxury at its finest with a stay at the breathtaking The Ungasan Clifftop Resort, in Uluwatu. Stay in an enormous three-bedroom villa overlooking the ocean complete with an infinity pool, enjoying sumptuous daily breakfast, butler service at your fingertips, VIP transports around the island with a private driver, return airport transfers, a USD$500 food and drinks credit and exclusive access to the spectacular Sundays Beach Club.
offer_address: Jl Pantai Selatan Gau | Banjar Wijaya Kusuma, Ungasan 80362, Indonesia

title: Six Senses Uluwatu Cliffside Suite & Villa Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Gourmet Lunch or Dinner, Nightly Cocktails & Massages
description:
Venture to the edge of the world - perched atop the famous limestone cliffs of Bali’s southernmost peninsula - and experience the pinnacle of secluded coastside living. Immerse yourself in sweeping views of the glittering Indian Ocean and watch as the sun dips below the horizon from the spectacular resort pool that clings to the cliff's edge over three terraced levels. As evening arrives, relax against the backdrop of the darkening sky with a delicious cocktail served at Cliff Bar, or watch a movie under the twinkling stars before venturing to one of Bali's many famed beach clubs.

This five-star opulent eco-sanctuary - the island's only World Green Council-certified resort - combines its signature zero-waste concept with carefully curated contemporary touches, creating effortlessly elegant spaces you’ll never want to leave. Rejuvenate your body and soul with daily yoga and meditation, relax at the blissful wellness spa and indulge in gourmet farm-to-table sustainable dining at the resort’s two restaurants, including Japanese and Peruvian fusion at the recently opened Watu Steakhouse. This secure paradise is where luxury meets true tranquillity.
offer_address: Jalan Goa Lempeh, Uluwatu 80361, Bali, Indonesia

title: Bali Five-Star Private Pool Clifftop Villas near Uluwatu with Daily Breakfast, One-Time Dinner & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Welcome to Karma Kandara, your own secluded slice of Balinese paradise, discreetly tucked away in Bali’s Bukit Peninsula, known globally as ‘Billionaire’s Row’. Ideally positioned clifftop in the charming seaside village of Ungasan near Uluwatu, this exclusive villa complex is within easy reach of some of Bali's best beach clubs, thriving restaurants, local markets and independent boutiques.

Perfect for couples, families or groups, Karma Kandara is home to a collection of expansive one, two and three-bedroom pool villas crafted in traditional Balinese style. While leaving your sumptuous sanctuary, nestled within the confines of a walled garden, is optional, there’s more to explore. Discover true tranquility at the resort's ocean-facing infinity pool and Cliff Spa, set into the rugged limestone cliffs with 180-degree views of the Indian Ocean. Sample Bali's finest at onsite restaurant di Mare, which combines high-quality ingredients and exotic flavours with Mediterranean influences, or opt for something more relaxed with beach-inspired bites at Karma Beach or custom cocktails at Temple Lounge. Then, when the sun sets, head to Veritas Wine Bar for a tasting experience, or dive into blissful barefoot hedonism at the glamorous Karma Beach Club. Accessible via a scenic cliffside inclinator lift, this celebrity favourite offers cocktails, oceanside spa treatments and good vibes to the sound of international DJ sets.
offer_address: Banjar Wijaya Kusuma, Ungasan, Kuta Selatan, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Bali Clifftop Pool Villa in Uluwatu
description: Experience five-star Balinese luxury at its finest with five nights of Uluwatu clifftop indulgence at Banyan Tree Ungasan. Stay in a huge 400sqm private pool villa and enjoy return airport transfers, daily breakfasts, exotic dining experiences, nightly sunset cocktails, massages, guided temple and village tour and more.

title: Balinese Pool Villa Indulgence with Daily Gourmet Dining Experiences

Stay in a huge 400sqm private pool villa, with the option to upgrade to stunning ocean views. The highlight of your stay will be the included gourmet dining experiences, with each morning beginning with a full breakfast at Bambu restaurant. Every evening you’ll return here nightly for a complimentary two-course dinner of signature Indonesian dishes and western favourites. Or take the option to switch one dinner for an unforgettable two-course lunch at Ju-Ma-Na, Banyan Tree’s fine-dining establishment, serving unique French-Japanese fusion. Also included in your stay is a private airport pick-up, a 30-minute massage, one cocktail per person and more.

description:

Treat yourself to a luxury pool villa stay and indulge in daily breakfast - including one decadent floating breakfast served in your private swimming pool - plus three delicious four-course dinners with a glass of wine per person, a two-course set-menu lunch, four 60-minute massages per room, a welcome drink on arrival and a private one-way transfer from Denpasar Airport. title: Stylish Uluwatu Clifftop Escape with Gourmet Dining & Daily Cocktails
description:
Fall in love with the super-stylish Radisson Blu Uluwatu, a waterfront oasis surrounded by palm tree-dotted grounds offering ultra-spacious rooms and five-star service. Experience a quintessential tropical escape and indulge in a daily buffet ‘Super Breakfast’, three two-course lunches or dinners at your choice of any of the onsite restaurants, a daily sunset cocktail for two, two 45-minute signature massages per adult and a private airport pick-up or drop-off from Denpasar airport.

Want to extend your stay? Combine your five and/or seven-night packages to stay even longer and receive double the inclusions.

⏱**Buy now, book later**: Secure this deal now and choose your travel dates when you're ready (see Fine Print for details)

title: Five-Star Uluwatu The Edge Villas with Glass-Bottom Cliffside Pool, Daily Breakfast, Nightly Dinners & Cocktails
description:
The towering cliffs of Uluwatu are the stunning setting for an exquisite collection of five-star private villas known as The Edge. Perched on the very edge of Bali’s southwestern corner, in the traditional village of Pecatu, this secluded resort is a masterclass in exclusivity and opulence, with just eight villas spread across the 2.5-hectare property. Start each day with a butler-served breakfast, before venturing to the onsite day club, oneeighty°, to plunge into the jaw-dropping glass-bottomed sky pool that extends six metres over the cliff edge. Discover true bliss at the cliffside spa, with treatments inspired by Balinese traditions, or head out for 18 holes at the international golf course, just 3km away.

With plenty to enthrall and entertain onsite, venturing further afield is completely optional - but keen surfers will find some of Bali’s best breaks just 10 minutes away. Take a day to explore the surrounding beaches, all filled with spectacular beach clubs and authentic restaurants, or drive up to the historic Uluwatu Temple for a dose of culture.
offer_address: Jl Pura Goa Lempeh, Banjar Dinas Kangin, Pecatu, Uluwatu, Bali 80361, Indonesia

title: Award-Winning Uluwatu Luxury near Dreamland Beach with Daily Dining
description:
Escape to the pristine shores of Uluwatu with a stay at Wyndham Dreamland Resort Bali, winner of a Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice Award 2020. Located just metres from scenic Dreamland Beach and the famed Uluwatu Temple, this is your personal gateway to the many wonders of southern Bali. Kick back and relax in an atmosphere which seamlessly blends unspoilt Bali beauty with sophisticated luxury, where elegantly designed accommodation, an eclectic dining scene and stunning surf breaks await.

Rooms come with contemporary Balinese design and modern luxuries. Sink into your plush bedding, take advantage of the walk-in wardrobe and enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi. Take your tastebuds on a delicious trip with the resort's multiple onsite dining options. Savour classic Indonesian fare at the vibrant Rayunan Restaurant or indulge in a Melbourne café-style brunch at Dreamland Café. In the evenings, catch an amazing view of the sunset with a drink or two at the stunning Sunset Deck Bar. If you're looking to take your first steps into the world of wellness, rejuvenate and refresh yourself at the Tirta Spa & Wellness Centre, or take up yoga at the expansive yoga studio.

**Bonus inclusions (select nights only)**

- Begin each day with delicious **breakfast** at Rayunan Restaurant
- Enjoy **daily lunch or dinner** for two at Rayunan Restaurant 
- Switch off with **one cocktail** per adult, per stay (for stays of 3+ nights)

**Travelling with family?** One child (aged 11 years and under) stays free in existing bedding with daily breakfast.
offer_address: Kawasan, Jl. Pecatu Indah Raya Jl. Pantai Dreamland, Pecatu, Kec. Kuta Sel., Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80364, Indonesia

vendor_name: The Ungasan Cliff Top Resort, Bali

description:

Sitting above Uluwatu’s famous Sundays Beach Club, this luxury resort redefines what it is to be truly relaxed, with a soundtrack of crashing waves and panoramic ocean views as far as the eye can see.

Suites and villas celebrate opulence - traditional architectural styles are combined with modern amenities to offer oceanside living at its best. title: Award-Winning Uluwatu Clifftop Escape with Daily Breakfast & Cocktails
description:
Perched on a clifftop overlooking the magnificent Indian Ocean, Radisson Blu Uluwatu beckons you with its tranquillity, spacious accommodation and world-class amenities. Situated close to the stunning beaches of Bingin and Padang Padang, this ultra-stylish, palm-dotted resort was awarded Best Coastal Design and Regional Winner in the Luxury Boutique Spa category at the World Luxury Spa Awards 2020.

Spend your days here discovering the island's exquisite coral reefs, golden beaches and volcanic mountains, before returning to this five-star oasis. Perfect for honeymooners and couples, this resort offers the best of relaxed island luxury. It's here that you can relax by the spectacular pool, indulge in traditional Indonesian and international delights at Artichoke or slick western fare at the semi-alfresco Choka pool bar, or take a breather and unwind with massages at the spa.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions (select nights)**

- Begin your day in Uluwatu with a **lavish buffet breakfast** at Artichoke restaurant
- Enjoy a **daily cocktail per person** at the Lookout bar or Choka pool bar
- Indulge with **a two-course lunch or dinner** at Artichoke or Choka, once during your stay (for stays of 3+ nights)
- Unwind with **one relaxing 45-minute spa treatment** each at Spa ESC (for stays of 4+ nights)
- Enjoy **a bonus two-course lunch or dinner** at Artichoke or Choka (total of two during your stay; for stays of 5+ nights)

**Looking for breathtaking ocean views?** Upgrade to an ocean-view room or suite to soak up awe-inspiring Indian Ocean vistas from your private balcony.
offer_address: Bali Uluwatu, Jl. Pemutih, Pecatu, Kec. Kuta Sel., Bali, 80364, Indonesia

title: Elevated Alila Uluwatu Private Pool Villa Luxury with Cliffside Infinity Pool
description: An unbeatable clifftop location and endless horizon panoramas await at the five-star Alila Villas Uluwatu, home to a refined collection of private pool villas offering sophisticated interiors and peaceful seclusion. While private pools outside your bedroom door promise effortless relaxation throughout your stay, a sunset swim in the refreshing waters of the celebrated infinity pool is a must. Make your way to Spa Alila for a transcendent experience using ancient Asian healing techniques and fresh, quality ingredients. Surrender to signature spa rituals where indulgent massages, body scrubs and masks using sandalwood and other herbs will leave you feeling rejuvenated and polished. When you're ready to descend from the heavenly clifftops and sink your toes into golden shores, the beach is accessible via an impressive exclusive stairway which hugs the cliffside.
offer_address: Jl. Belimbing Sari Tambiyak, Pecatu, South Kuta, Badung Regency, Bali 80364, Indonesia

description: Venture to the edge of the world, where every view is of the ocean and secluded luxury is a given: this is Six Senses Uluwatu - a cliffside sanctuary perched on the southernmost tip of Bali, ranked among the top five hotels in Uluwatu on Tripadvisor. Here, a spectacular pool clings to the cliff's edge over three terraced levels, and watching the sun dip towards the glittering ocean is best enjoyed while sipping cocktails. Bali’s only World Green Council-certified resort, Six Senses Uluwatu proudly focuses on recycling, composting and reusing, using sustainable architecture with contemporary Balinese touches. description: Secluded luxury and endless ocean views await at the five-star Anantara Uluwatu Bali Resort, an award-winning sanctuary of serenity. Perfectly poised on a clifftop on Bali's south coast, overlooking the Indian Ocean, this luxury hotel is surrounded by dramatic coastline, native jungle and lush rice paddies, yet just 15 minutes from the centre of bustling Uluwatu. Intimate and stylish, Anantara will exceed your expectation of paradise with its myriad luxe facilities. Tantalise your tastebuds with fusion delights at a host of bars and restaurants, relish lazy days at the Insta-worthy infinity pool, discover true tranquillity at Anantara Spa, slice through the cliffside with private beach elevator access to the sands below and soak up the chilled-out vibes of Uluwatu with complimentary beach shuttles.
